depot.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a place where goods are stored until they are needed
depot.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a railway station or bus station, especially a small one
depot.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a place where large quantities of goods, equipment, or materials are stored until they are needed
depot.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The business is opening a new distribution depot in the Midlands.
depot.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a place where buses or trains are kept until they are needed, and often repaired and maintained
depot.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: the main British Rail maintenance depot
depot.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: a small bus or railway station
